content.text:
{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":82041,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが箱に入ったなにかを","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance showed something inside a box"},{"lineNumber":82042,"originalJapaneseLine":"クルックーに見せつけた。","translatedEnglishLine":"to Krukkoo."},{"lineNumber":82043,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-this—\""},

{"lineNumber":82044,"originalJapaneseLine":"「鋼鉄黒飴貝……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Steel Black Candy Shell...!\""},

{"lineNumber":82045,"originalJapaneseLine":"常にまったく動かないクルックーの瞳が、","translatedEnglishLine":"Krukkoo’s eyes, which always remained completely still,"},

{"lineNumber":82046,"originalJapaneseLine":"ほんの少しだけかすかに開かれ、","translatedEnglishLine":"opened just a tiny bit,"},

{"lineNumber":82047,"originalJapaneseLine":"頬はうっすらと紅潮していた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and his cheeks were faintly flushed."},

{"lineNumber":82048,"originalJapaneseLine":"「レアものです……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's a rare item..."},

{"lineNumber":82049,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス、これはいいものです。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance, this is a fine thing."},

{"lineNumber":82050,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すごくいいものです」","translatedEnglishLine":"A very, very good thing.\" "},

{"lineNumber":82051,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、すごいだろう！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahaha, amazing, isn’t it!"},

{"lineNumber":82052,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺も発見したときはビックリしたぞ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I was surprised when I found it too!\""},

{"lineNumber":82053,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、私もビックリしています……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, I’m surprised as well..."},

{"lineNumber":82054,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まさか、生きている間に","translatedEnglishLine":"I never thought the day would come when in my lifetime"},

{"lineNumber":82055,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お目にかかれる日が来るとは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I’d have the chance to see one...\""},

{"lineNumber":82056,"originalJapaneseLine":"「世界でも五つもないと言われる鋼鉄黒飴貝は、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Steel Black Candy Shells, said to number only five in the world,"},

{"lineNumber":82057,"originalJapaneseLine":"　元々数が希少な上に地中奥深くにしか","translatedEnglishLine":"are extremely rare, and are said to exist only deep underground."},

{"lineNumber":82058,"originalJapaneseLine":"　存在しないと言われているものです」","translatedEnglishLine":"\" "},

{"lineNumber":82059,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それが出土したとなれば、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If one is excavated,"},

{"lineNumber":82060,"originalJapaneseLine":"　業界はそれだけで騒然としますよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"the industry would be thrown into an uproar just by that.\" "},

{"lineNumber":82061,"originalJapaneseLine":"クルックーはいつもに比べると、","translatedEnglishLine":"Compared to usual, Krukkoo was speaking a bit faster."},

{"lineNumber":82062,"originalJapaneseLine":"少しだけ早口になっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":""},

{"lineNumber":82063,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ですが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However...\""},

{"lineNumber":82064,"originalJapaneseLine":"「残念ながら割れていますね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Unfortunately, it’s broken.\" "},

{"lineNumber":82065,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうなのだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, that’s right...\""},

{"lineNumber":82066,"originalJapaneseLine":"「発見したときには、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"When I discovered it,"},

{"lineNumber":82067,"originalJapaneseLine":"　既にこんな無惨な姿に……」","translatedEnglishLine":"it was already in such a pitiful state...\""},

{"lineNumber":82068,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それは……残念ですね……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That is... unfortunate..."},

{"lineNumber":82069,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いえ、そんな言葉では表せるものでは……","translatedEnglishLine":"No, words like that can’t really express it..."},

{"lineNumber":82070,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人類の大いなる損失です……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It is a great loss for humanity...\""},

{"lineNumber":82071,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、お前なら分かってくれると思っていたぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, I knew you would understand.\" "},

{"lineNumber":82072,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貝のことなら当然です」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That’s obvious when it comes to shells.\" "},

{"lineNumber":82073,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむうむ、そうだろうそうだろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, yes, exactly.\" "},

{"lineNumber":82074,"originalJapaneseLine":"「って、わけで、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So, here’s the thing,"},

{"lineNumber":82075,"originalJapaneseLine":"　法王特典を使ってこれを直してくれ」","translatedEnglishLine":"use the Papal Privilege to fix this.\" "},

{"lineNumber":82076,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh...?\" "},

{"lineNumber":82077,"originalJapaneseLine":"クルックーが、クルックーにしては珍しく、","translatedEnglishLine":"Krukkoo, unusually for him,"},

{"lineNumber":82078,"originalJapaneseLine":"少し大きな声で驚いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"was surprised and raised his voice a bit."},

{"lineNumber":82079,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},

{"lineNumber":82080,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス、これが大事なのは分かります。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rance, I understand this is important."},

{"lineNumber":82081,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ですが、法王特典は……","translatedEnglishLine":"But the Papal Privilege is..."},

{"lineNumber":82082,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これが大事なのは分かるのだろう！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You know this is important, don’t you?!"},

{"lineNumber":82083,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なら、法王特典なんてすごいものは、","translatedEnglishLine":"Then what else is the amazing Papal Privilege for,"},

{"lineNumber":82084,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これ以外の何に使うというのだ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"if not to be used for this!?"},

{"lineNumber":82085,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……いえ、ですが","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...No, but still,"},

{"lineNumber":82086,"originalJapaneseLine":"「例えば、法王特典なら、","translatedEnglishLine":"For example, the Papal Privilege can even bring the dead back to life."},

{"lineNumber":82087,"originalJapaneseLine":"　死んだ者も生き返らせられるのですよ？","translatedEnglishLine":"You could revive the dead, you know?"},

{"lineNumber":82088,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今後、使いたいときが来るかも――","translatedEnglishLine":"There might be a time in the future when you’ll want to use it—"},

{"lineNumber":82089,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんときは、そんときに、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"When that time comes, at that time,"},

{"lineNumber":82090,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうするか考えればいい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"we can think about what to do...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが箱に入ったなにかを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance showed something inside a box

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーに見せつけた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to Krukkoo.
"Th-this—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「鋼鉄黒飴貝……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Steel Black Candy Shell...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 常にまったく動かないクルックーの瞳が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Krukkoo’s eyes, which always remained completely still,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほんの少しだけかすかに開かれ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: opened just a tiny bit,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頬はうっすらと紅潮していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and his cheeks were faintly flushed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「レアものです……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's a rare item...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、これはいいものです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, this is a fine thing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すごくいいものです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A very, very good thing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、すごいだろう！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahaha, amazing, isn’t it!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺も発見したときはビックリしたぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was surprised when I found it too!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、私もビックリしています……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, I’m surprised as well...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか、生きている間に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I never thought the day would come when in my lifetime

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お目にかかれる日が来るとは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’d have the chance to see one..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「世界でも五つもないと言われる鋼鉄黒飴貝は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Steel Black Candy Shells, said to number only five in the world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元々数が希少な上に地中奥深くにしか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are extremely rare, and are said to exist only deep underground.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 存在しないと言われているものです」
「それが出土したとなれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If one is excavated,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 業界はそれだけで騒然としますよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the industry would be thrown into an uproar just by that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーはいつもに比べると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Compared to usual, Krukkoo was speaking a bit faster.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少しだけ早口になっていた。
「ですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「残念ながら割れていますね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Unfortunately, it’s broken."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうなのだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, that’s right..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「発見したときには、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When I discovered it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既にこんな無惨な姿に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was already in such a pitiful state..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは……残念ですね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That is... unfortunate...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえ、そんな言葉では表せるものでは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, words like that can’t really express it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類の大いなる損失です……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is a great loss for humanity..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ、お前なら分かってくれると思っていたぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, I knew you would understand."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貝のことなら当然です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That’s obvious when it comes to shells."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむうむ、そうだろうそうだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, yes, exactly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「って、わけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, here’s the thing,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 法王特典を使ってこれを直してくれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: use the Papal Privilege to fix this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーが、クルックーにしては珍しく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Krukkoo, unusually for him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し大きな声で驚いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was surprised and raised his voice a bit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス、これが大事なのは分かります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rance, I understand this is important.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ですが、法王特典は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But the Papal Privilege is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これが大事なのは分かるのだろう！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You know this is important, don’t you?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら、法王特典なんてすごいものは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then what else is the amazing Papal Privilege for,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これ以外の何に使うというのだ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if not to be used for this!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……いえ、ですが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...No, but still,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「例えば、法王特典なら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For example, the Papal Privilege can even bring the dead back to life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死んだ者も生き返らせられるのですよ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You could revive the dead, you know?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今後、使いたいときが来るかも――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There might be a time in the future when you’ll want to use it—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんときは、そんときに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When that time comes, at that time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうするか考えればいい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we can think about what to do..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが箱に入ったなにかを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance showed something inside a box

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーに見せつけた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to Krukkoo.
"Th-this—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「鋼鉄黒飴貝……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Steel Black Candy Shell...!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 常にまったく動かないクルックーの瞳が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Krukkoo’s eyes, which always remained completely still,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほんの少しだけかすかに開かれ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: opened just a tiny bit,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頬はうっすらと紅潮していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and his cheeks were faintly flushed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「レアものです……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's a rare item...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、これはいいものです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, this is a fine thing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すごくいいものです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A very, very good thing."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、すごいだろう！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahaha, amazing, isn’t it!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺も発見したときはビックリしたぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was surprised when I found it too!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、私もビックリしています……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, I’m surprised as well...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか、生きている間に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I never thought the day would come when in my lifetime

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お目にかかれる日が来るとは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’d have the chance to see one..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「世界でも五つもないと言われる鋼鉄黒飴貝は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Steel Black Candy Shells, said to number only five in the world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 元々数が希少な上に地中奥深くにしか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are extremely rare, and are said to exist only deep underground.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 存在しないと言われているものです」
「それが出土したとなれば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If one is excavated,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 業界はそれだけで騒然としますよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the industry would be thrown into an uproar just by that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーはいつもに比べると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Compared to usual, Krukkoo was speaking a bit faster.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少しだけ早口になっていた。
「ですが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「残念ながら割れていますね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Unfortunately, it’s broken."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうなのだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, that’s right..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「発見したときには、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When I discovered it,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 既にこんな無惨な姿に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it was already in such a pitiful state..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは……残念ですね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That is... unfortunate...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いえ、そんな言葉では表せるものでは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, words like that can’t really express it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類の大いなる損失です……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is a great loss for humanity..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむ、お前なら分かってくれると思っていたぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, I knew you would understand."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「貝のことなら当然です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That’s obvious when it comes to shells."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うむうむ、そうだろうそうだろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, yes, exactly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「って、わけで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So, here’s the thing,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 法王特典を使ってこれを直してくれ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: use the Papal Privilege to fix this."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーが、クルックーにしては珍しく、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Krukkoo, unusually for him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し大きな声で驚いた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was surprised and raised his voice a bit.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス、これが大事なのは分かります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Rance, I understand this is important.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ですが、法王特典は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But the Papal Privilege is...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これが大事なのは分かるのだろう！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You know this is important, don’t you?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら、法王特典なんてすごいものは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then what else is the amazing Papal Privilege for,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これ以外の何に使うというのだ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if not to be used for this!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……いえ、ですが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...No, but still,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「例えば、法王特典なら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For example, the Papal Privilege can even bring the dead back to life.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死んだ者も生き返らせられるのですよ？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You could revive the dead, you know?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今後、使いたいときが来るかも――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There might be a time in the future when you’ll want to use it—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんときは、そんときに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "When that time comes, at that time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうするか考えればいい……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we can think about what to do..."
